inclusion.criterion: Children with MAM or non-complicated SAM aged 6-59 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Only the youngest child with malnutrition in each household will be enrolled.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic debilitating illness like cerebral palsy or congenital abnormalities, or having received treatment for MAM or SAM in the previous two months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Informed consent will be sought from the caretakers of all eligible children by a nurse familiar with the study and fluent in the caretaker's native language.
exclusion.label: met

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side.
